h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Your journey through the Pagoda Realm isn't done yet however, as there's a large linear mountain pass with a few branching paths to explore as you exit this particular area.

Your journey through the Pagoda Realm isn't done yet however, as there's a large linear mountain pass with a few branching paths to explore as you exit this particular area.
